
PMcG added clocking to exp section of 130kHZ as per P99K example
PMCG 16th july2012 - removed rst from Hbin section - may fix binning - note sw is not used in binning dont know why
16th july patternfile recieved from p steen
STA2400A Thin poly, front, 3 phase IMO spectroscopy device 1662X200.
This pattern uses the 4K channel with 4 speeds of 1.48MHz, 400kHz, 130kHz and 35kHz.
Implant is under Image 3.
Sequence is I1, I2, I3 down towards the shift reg.
Image 3 is last row before shift reg.
Charge is transfered into R1 and R2 with R3 aligned with channel stops.
Sequence is: Node, OTG, SW, R3, R2, R1, R3...
S1 to S4	Storage area clks
I1 to I4	Image area clks
B		Engine branch bit
SB1 to SP4	Engine loop speed bits (1+2exp(n-1))
RST		CCD reset
PEN
HVF		EMCCD HV falling edge
AMP		Input amp restore
DSR
HVR		EMCCD HV rising edge
CDS		
R1 to R3	Horz register clks
MUX		Mux between analog channels
DSP
FIR		FIRE engine output
DSN
PA1		Pre amp gain 1 overide
FRA		FRAME engine output
RS		Reset sample (D-CDS)
SS		Signal sample (D-CDS); USB keep quiet
OSK		OS kill (stop CCD output amp glow)
CG2		Clamp-to-ground on analog channel 2
PA2		Pre amp gain 2 overide
PXL		Valid output pixel clk
SW		Summing well clk
****************************************************************************************
***PO1 original

****************************************************************************************


00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SIIBSSSS 	SSI-ISR- 	-PH-AD-- 	HC-RR--M 	D-FD-P-F 	RSROCPPS
441 BBBB	123 23S  	 EV MS   	VD 31  U 	S IS A R 	SS2SGAXW
    4321	      T		 NF PR		RS     X	P RN 1 A	   K22L
<VS-st>
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-st>					

<VS-all>	
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-all>				

<PDT>
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\PDT>

SIIB---- 	SSI-ISR- 	-PH-AD-- 	HC-RR--M 	D-FD-P-F 	RSROCPPS
441      	123 23S  	 EV MS   	VD 31  U 	S IS A R 	SS2SGAXW
       	              T	 	 NF PR		RS     X	P RN 1 A	   K22L
<HV>				
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000101	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00010101	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\HV>

<VH>
00000111	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000111	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	10100000
00000110	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00010110	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\VH>

1.48MHz starts here.

441      	123 23S  	 EV MS   	VD 31  U 	S IS A R 	SS2SGAXW
		      T		 NF PR		RS     X	P RN 1 A	   K22L
